unnormalised: I remember when my cousin, Priya, in Mumbai, was feeling really down. She started using one of these apps. It helped her track her moods and even connect with a therapist online. Initially, she was skeptical, like in a Karan Johar film where the hero's hiding his feelings. Now, she swears by it. Maybe NIMHANS should explore partnerships with these apps? It's like getting a little bit of Shanti right in your pocket!
